Reviews.Title: Great Videos
Reviews.Author: J.O.G.
Reviews.Content: This  makes great videos.  Very good definition.  Only one problem that I see.  I believe shadows are triggering the motion sensor, and I get a lot of clips with no one in the room.  Other than that this unit works great.

ProductInfo.Features:
Adjustable accurate motion sensitivity up to 10 meters
Record from 3 second before motion, never miss a moment
1280*720 / 720*480 / 640*480 pixels, selectable
Night vision, Remote Operation, Fixed or Temporary installation
A/C Power Supply, Built-in rechargeable battery
ProductInfo.Name: PIR Smart Cam Hd 1280x720 Motion Recording, for Home, Office and Store Security
